subject: Your account has been suspended!
body: Click here to verify your account before it’s permanently disabled: http://micros0ft-verify.tk

subject: Your semester grades are available
body: Please log in to your official university portal to view your results.

subject: Unusual activity detected
body: Confirm your account immediately to avoid being locked out.

subject: Team lunch this Friday!
body: Hey everyone, don’t forget our team lunch at noon on Friday at the cafeteria!
